text: Asics is an Japanese sportswear company. The name is from the Latin word anima sana in corpore sano, which means "a sound mind, in a sound body". It produces clothing and sneakers. The company is headquartered in Kobe, Hy≈çgo Prefecture and was founded on September 1, 1949 as Onitsuka Co., Ltd. == Other websites == * Category:1949 establishments in Asia Category:1940s establishments in Japan Category:Footwear Category:Manufacturing companies of Japan
title: Asics
